For <S%G1063><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had laid hold <S%G2902><s%> <S%G5660><s%> on Yochanan <S%G2491><s%>, and bound <S%G1210><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> put <S%G5087><s%> <S%G5639><s%> him in <S%G1722><s%> prison <S%G5438><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> Herodias' <S%G2266><s%> sake <S%G1223><s%>, his <S%G846><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> Philip's <S%G5376><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>.

Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> he promised <S%G3670><s%> <S%G5656><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> an oath <S%G3727><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5629><s%> her <S%G846><s%> whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> she would ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5672><s%>.
